license.message: Valid License Tag in rarian-0.8.1-19.el8.x86_64: LGPLv2+

xml-files.message: File /usr/share/librarian/manual/rar-mdf.xhtml is a malformed XML file on x86_64
xml-files.details: Element body content does not follow the DTD, expecting (p | h1 | h2 | h3 | h4 | h5 | h6 | div | ul | ol | dl | pre | hr | blockquote | address | fieldset | table | form | noscript | ins | del | script)*, got (p h2 p p p hr h2 p quote h3 p ul h3 p dl p h3 p dl h2 p p p h3 p p ul p )
xml-files.remedy: Correct the reported errors in the XML document

runpath.message: /usr/bin/rarian-example has an invalid-looking DT_RPATH on x86_64: /usr/lib64
runpath.remedy: Either DT_RPATH or DT_RUNPATH properties were found on ELF shared objects in this package.  The use of DT_RPATH and DT_RUNPATH is discouraged except in certain situations.  Check to see that you a disabling rpath during the %build stage of the spec file.  If you are unable to do this easily, you can try using a program such as patchelf to remove these properties from the ELF files.
